title: Auth System Requirements
context:
The authentication system should use JWT tokens with a 15-minute expiration for access tokens and 7-day refresh tokens. We need to implement:

1. OAuth 2.0 flow for third-party providers
2. Rate limiting on login attempts
3. Session management with Redis
4. Audit logging for security events

title: API Rate Limiting Strategy
context:
Implement tiered rate limiting based on user subscription level:

- Free: 100 requests/hour
- Pro: 1000 requests/hour
- Enterprise: 10000 requests/hour

Use sliding window algorithm with Redis for distributed rate limiting.

title: Database Schema v2 Ideas
context:
Considering moving to a more normalized schema for better query performance. Key changes:

- Separate user preferences into its own table
- Add composite indexes for common query patterns
- Implement soft deletes across all tables
